scripts.cy:open:wait: npx wait-on -i 2000 http://127.0.0.1:8080 && cypress open --env env=local
scripts.cy:open:wait:remote: npx wait-on -i 2000 http://127.0.0.1:8080 && cypress open --env env=remote
scripts.cy:run: rimraf cypress/results/* && run-p -r start start-http-server start-backend cypress:run:wait
scripts.cypress:run:wait: npx wait-on -i 2000 http-get://localhost:4200/main.js && npx wait-on -i 2000 http://127.0.0.1:8080 && cypress run
scripts.deploy-gh-pages:
npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && ng build --base-href=https://hanskerkhof.github.io/angular-tic-tac-toe/ && ng deploy --no-build --no-silent --name='CI/CD' --email='info@netmatic.nl' --message='[ci skip] deploy-gh-pages

Skip this commit on CircleCi' && echo 'https://hanskerkhof.github.io/angular-tic-tac-toe/' && npm version
scripts.deploy-heroku: cd backend && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && cd .. && heroku git:remote -a tic-tac-toe-95772 && git remote --verbose && git subtree push --prefix backend heroku master
